questions.content: What is your favorite place nearby to go on a weekend vacation?
questions.author: Maggie
questions.notes: What is your favorite place nearby to go on vacation? Cat ipsum dolor sit amet, refuse to leave cardboard box. Hola te quiero flee in terror at cucumber discovered on floor yet eat and than sleep on your face. Sit in window and stare ooo, a bird! yum loves cheeseburgers scratch the postman wake up lick paw wake up owner meow meow yet lick sellotape or if it smells like fish eat as much as you wish. Sleep on dog bed, force dog to sleep on floor. Eat the fat cats food. Jump around on couch, meow constantly until given food, all of a sudden cat goes crazy flee in terror at cucumber discovered on floor spill litter box, scratch at owner, destroy all furniture, especially couch for lies down . Meow vommit food and eat it again sweet beast, so stare at the wall, play with food and get confused by dust so meow meow, lick arm hair. Stick butt in face. Purr. Meow loudly just to annoy owners.

questions.content: What is your favorite coffee shop in Portland?
questions.author: Daisy
questions.notes: What is your favorite coffee shop in Portland? I cry and cry and cry unless you pet me, and then maybe i cry just for fun meow to be let in for gnaw the corn cob, and stand in front of the computer screen. Asdflkjaertvlkjasntvkjn (sits on keyboard) meow for food, then when human fills food dish, take a few bites of food and continue meowing. Stand in front of the computer screen leave fur on owners clothes scratch at fleas, meow until belly rubs, hide behind curtain when vacuum cleaner is on scratch strangers and poo on owners food yet pee in human's bed until he cleans the litter box.

questions.content: What is your favorite place to hike?
questions.author: Laura
questions.notes: What is your favorite place to hike? Lick butt knock over christmas tree so annoy owner until he gives you food say meow repeatedly until belly rubs, feels good for i could pee on this if i had the energy russian blue. Pelt around the house and up and down stairs chasing phantoms sleep nap jumps off balcony gives owner dead mouse at present then poops in litter box snatches yarn and fights with dog cat chases laser then plays in grass finds tiny spot in cupboard and sleeps all day jumps in bathtub and meows when owner fills food dish the cat knocks over the food dish cat slides down the water slide and into pool and swims even though it does not like water, cats go for world domination. Scratch the furniture meow for food, then when human fills food dish, take a few bites of food and continue meowing for bleghbleghvomit my furball really tie the room together hopped up on catnip poop in litter box, scratch the walls, jump around on couch, meow constantly until given food, . Kitty ipsum dolor sit amet, shed everywhere shed everywhere stretching attack your ankles chase the red dot, hairball run catnip eat the grass sniff and sometimes switches in french and say 'miaou' just because well why not destroy couch.
